id.description: The unique identifier for the review.

date_created.description: The date and time when the review was created (local timezone).

date_created_gmt.description: The date and time when the review was created (GMT/UTC timezone).

product_id.description: The unique identifier of the product associated with the review.

status.description: The status of the review (e.g., pending, approved, spam).

reviewer.description: The name or username of the reviewer.

reviewer_email.description: The email address of the reviewer (optional).

review.description: The text content of the review left by the reviewer.

rating.description: The rating given in the review (e.g., 1 to 5 stars).

verified.description: Indicates whether the review has been verified as authentic (true/false).
